subtitle: A collection of core technologies selected to support scalability, maintainability, and a superior developer experience.

data.rationale: Next.js App Router provides a unified framework for routing, layouts, server rendering, and data mutation. This approach enables SEO-friendly pages while keeping UI logic and data cohesive, reducing boilerplate and enhancing long-term maintainability.
Tailwind CSS employs a utility-first approach with centralized design tokens, allowing for rapid UI iteration while maintaining visual consistency without the complexity of massive custom CSS files.
Built on top of Radix primitives, Shadcn/UI provides accessible and composable components without locking the project into a rigid design system, offering full control over styling and behavior.

Gin was chosen for its exceptional high-performance and small memory footprint. As a minimalist framework, it provides granular control over the request-response lifecycle, making it ideal for high-throughput services.

PostgreSQL is the industry standard for rigorous data integrity. Its support for complex data types (JSONB) and advanced concurrency features makes it a reliable foundation for managing intricate employee records and transaction histories.

GORM provides a rich abstraction to accelerate the development process without sacrificing flexibility. With features like auto-migration and hooks, it seamlessly synchronizes Go domain models with the PostgreSQL schema.
Ensures strict runtime validation at both ends: Zod for TypeScript type safety on the frontend, and Go Validator to guarantee data schema integrity on the backend before processing.
Handles server-state caching, data synchronization, and background refetching, reducing manual data-fetching logic and ensuring the UI stays consistent with the backend state.
Provides a minimal and predictable state management solution for local UI states, keeping complexity low and state logic easy to reason about.
